mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TB_WORK_STEP t where t.STEPID = #{stepId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_WORK_STEP ( STEPID, COMPANYID, WROKID, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME, STEP, STEPNAME, ROLEID, ROLENAME, OPERATORID, OPERATORNAME, ENDTIME, OPERATESTATUS, OPERATORORGID, OPERATORORGNAME, REMARKS ) VALUES( #{info.stepId:VARCHAR}, #{info.companyId:VARCHAR}, #{info.wrokId:VARCHAR}, #{info.createtime:VARCHAR}, #{info.updatetime:VARCHAR}, #{info.step:VARCHAR}, #{info.stepName:VARCHAR}, #{info.roleId:VARCHAR}, #{info.roleName:VARCHAR}, #{info.operatorId:VARCHAR}, #{info.operatorName:VARCHAR}, #{info.endTime:VARCHAR}, #{info.operateStatus:NUMERIC}, #{info.operatorOrgId:VARCHAR}, #{info.operatorOrgName:VARCHAR}, #{info.remarks:VARCHAR} )

INSERT INTO TB_WORK_STEP ( STEPID, COMPANYID, WROKID, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME, STEP, STEPNAME, ROLEID, ROLENAME, OPERATORID, OPERATORNAME, ENDTIME, OPERATESTATUS, OPERATORORGID, OPERATORORGNAME, REMARKS ) VALUES
( #{info.stepId:VARCHAR}, #{info.companyId:VARCHAR}, #{info.wrokId:VARCHAR}, #{info.createtime:VARCHAR}, #{info.updatetime:VARCHAR}, #{info.step:VARCHAR}, #{info.stepName:VARCHAR}, #{info.roleId:VARCHAR}, #{info.roleName:VARCHAR}, #{info.operatorId:VARCHAR}, #{info.operatorName:VARCHAR}, #{info.endTime:VARCHAR}, #{info.operateStatus:NUMERIC}, #{info.operatorOrgId:VARCHAR}, #{info.operatorOrgName:VARCHAR}, #{info.remarks:VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_WORK_STEP SET COMPANYID = #{info.companyId:VARCHAR}, WROKID = #{info.wrokId:VARCHAR}, UPDATETIME = #{info.updatetime:VARCHAR}, STEP = #{info.step:VARCHAR}, STEPNAME = #{info.stepName:VARCHAR}, ROLEID = #{info.roleId:VARCHAR}, ROLENAME = #{info.roleName:VARCHAR}, OPERATORID = #{info.operatorId:VARCHAR}, OPERATORNAME = #{info.operatorName:VARCHAR}, ENDTIME = #{info.endTime:VARCHAR}, OPERATESTATUS = #{info.operateStatus:NUMERIC}, OPERATORORGID = #{info.operatorOrgId:VARCHAR}, OPERATORORGNAME = #{info.operatorOrgName:VARCHAR}, REMARKS = #{info.remarks:VARCHAR} WHERE STEPID = #{info.stepId}
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM TB_WORK_STEP WHERE STEPID in
#{ids}
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM TB_WORK_STEP t WHERE 1=1
and ( 2=1 or t.STEPID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.COMPANYID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.WROKID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.CREATETIME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.UPDATETIME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.STEP LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.STEPNAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.ROLEID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.ROLENAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.OPERATORID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.OPERATORNAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.ENDTIME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.OPERATORORGID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.REMARKS LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') )
order by t.UPDATETIME DESC
